descriptive.question: What is the color of [chair_1]?
answer: [chair_1] is wearing a white shirt and tie.

explanatory.question: Why is [person_1] raising eyebrows?
answer: Maybe [person_1] wants to practice to strengthen the hand.

predictive.question: What is [person_1] going to do?
answer: [person_1] is going to keep trying to raise eyebrows.
reason: [person_1] is going to put the shoe down.

counterfactual.question: What will happen if [person_1] stops raising her eyebrows?
answer: [person_1] will try to catch the birds.
reason: [person_1] needs to get her hair wet to comb it.
[person_1] was suddenly slapped by the other person.
